dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Al is used for a cathode current collector and Cu is used as an anode current collector. Al and Cu current collectors can further be categorized into foil, meshed, foam and carbon coated type current collectors. Meshed foil is generally lighter than regular foil with the same thickness. It can improve device power density due to its lighter weight. Standard aluminum foil is typically around 0.016 mm thick, while heavy-duty aluminum foil can range from 0.02 mm to 0.025 mm thick. This extra thickness gives the heavy-duty aluminum foil more strength and durability, making it better suited for demanding applications, such as wrapping large roasts, freezing foods for long periods, or cooking. In this work, we propose a new type of Al 3+ aqueous electrolyte for Cu-Al dual-ion battery with copper foil as anode and CuS on titanium foil as cathode.

铝用作阴极集流器，铜用作阳极集流器。铝和铜集流器又可分为箔式、网状、泡沫和碳涂层式集流器。网状箔通常比相同厚度的普通箔轻。由于重量更轻，它可以提高设备的功率密度。标准铝箔的厚度通常在 0.016 毫米左右，而重型铝箔的厚度则从 0.02 毫米到 0.025 毫米不等。这种额外的厚度赋予了重型铝箔更高的强度和耐用性，使其更适合要求苛刻的应用，如包裹大型烤肉、长时间冷冻食品或烹饪。在这项工作中，我们为铜铝双离子电池提出了一种新型 Al 3+ 水电解质，以铜箔为阳极，以钛箔上的 CuS 为阴极。
